001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
011
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Set;
014import java.util.WeakHashMap;
015
016/**
017 * Custom optimizer that implements Cumulative with Reset Gradient Descent algorithm.
018 * We keep accumulating the parameterGradients, but reset them once we are going to oscillate.
019 *
020 * @param <N>
021 */
022public class ARGOptimizer<N extends Number> implements UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>, LearningRateConfigurable<N> {
023
024    private final Map<LinearCombination<N>, N[]> accumulatedGradients = new WeakHashMap<>();
025
026    private N learningRate;
027
028    public ARGOptimizer(N learningRate) {
029        this.learningRate = learningRate;
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public Vector<N> calculateUpdate(Vector<N> gradients, LinearCombination<N> model, int step, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
034        N[] accumulatedGradients = this.accumulatedGradients.computeIfAbsent(model, k -> model.getCurrentNumberType().createArray(model.getParameterCount()));
035        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = model.getCurrentNumberType();
036
037        N[] parameters = model.getParameters();
038        Vector<N> thetas = Vectors.of(model.getCurrentNumberType(), parameters).transpose();
039        Vector<N> regularizationGradients = Regularizations.applyExplicitRegularization(regularizations, thetas, gradients);
040
041        for (int i = 0; i < regularizationGradients.getDimensions(); i++) {
042            N newGradient = regularizationGradients.get(i + 1);
043            if (typeSupport.hasSameSign(newGradient, accumulatedGradients[i])) {
044                accumulatedGradients[i] = typeSupport.add(accumulatedGradients[i], newGradient);
045            } else {
046                accumulatedGradients[i] = newGradient;
047            }
048        }
049
050        return Vectors.of(typeSupport, accumulatedGradients).transpose().multiply(model.getCurrentNumberType().negate(learningRate));
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
055        return Map.of(HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate);
056    }
057
058    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
059    @Override
060    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
061        if (HP_LEARNING_RATE.equals(name)) {
062            this.learningRate = (N) value;
063        }
064    }
065}
